statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -8 \\ -4 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -15 \\ -7 \\ -33 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -21 \\ -11 \\ -39 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
